# Set Up

Load functions.

```{r load}
library(CRDS-processing)
```

Set variables.

```{r variables}
runDate = "2020-03-05"
instrument = "hids2046"
init()
```

# Check Files

```{r check}
files = file_lookup(instrument, runDate, dataPath)
files = check_files(files)
```

# Calibrate Data

```{r calibrate}
corrected = process_data(files)
review_data(corrected)
```

# Write Output

```{r write}
#db(corrected, analyst)
excel(files$ids.file,corrected)
```
